title: Corda UTXO ledger Configuration Schema
description: Configuration schema for the UTXO ledger.

minDelayBeforeNextFullSync.description: The minimum amount of time Corda waits before starting another full token cache synchronization, in seconds.

minDelayBeforeNextPeriodicSync.description: The minimum amount of time Corda waits before starting another periodic cache synchronization, in seconds.

fullSyncBlockSize.description: The number of records per synchronization message during a full token cache synchronization.

periodCheckBlockSize.description: The number of state references per synchronization message during a periodic token cache synchronization check.

sendWakeUpMaxRetryAttempts.description: The maximum number of attempts to send the synchronization wake-up messages on component start.

sendWakeUpMaxRetryDelay.description: The maximum delay before a retry is scheduled, in seconds

cachedTokenPageSize.description: The page size of the query that retrieves tokens from the database

claimTimeoutSeconds.description: Time in seconds before the claim will be automatically released (default 10 minutes)

batchSize.description: Maximum size of each batch when doing a backchain resolution.
